casebody.data:
REIS
v.
CARSWELL 328P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 29, 2019

Ray Corne, Attorney at Law, Newton, For Carswell, Barbara Anthony

Roxy L. Root

Rebecca J. Yoder, Attorney at Law, Lincolnton

Cathy Carswell Reis, For Reis, Cathy Anne Carswell

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of August 2019 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of August 2019."
